message: Let's split it 60-40. It's a fair start!
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Let's see if we can meet in the middle!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not willing to give up that much. Let's try again!
Getting closer, but still not there. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need a bit more.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot!
I'm not budging much more. You're getting close, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
I'm getting close to giving up, but I still think I can get a better deal. Let's try one more time!
I'm not going to give up either. I'll meet you at 8000, but that's my final offer.
